attributes.action: 'recognise that public sector pay (including pension costs) need to be severly curtailed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: despite the Labour party's alliance with the unions and a pending PM election, it is not possible for the UK to continue to increase its total spend (INCLUDING FINAL SALARY PENSIONS and JOB SECURITY) on public services at the current rate and urgent measures are needed to control costs. Corporations and private individuals cannot continue to fund the tax burden.  The UK needs to remain competitive. The NHS, Prison officer dispute, local government etc. are all areas where costs are going up.
